import axios from 'axios';
import {API_URL} from '../Config';

const COURSE_API = API_URL + '/courses';
const CHAPTER_API = API_URL + '/chapters';

const fetchCourses = async () =>{
  
	return [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "title": "course title la mécanique quantique",
            "description": `Django REST framework is a powerful and flexible toolkit for building Web APIs.

Some reasons you might want to use REST framework:

The Web browsable API is a huge usability win for your developers.
Authentication policies including packages for OAuth1a and OAuth2.
Serialization that supports both ORM and non-ORM data sources.
Customizable all the way down - just use regular function-based views if you don't need the more powerful features.
Extensive documentation, and great community support.
Used and trusted by internationally recognised companies including Mozilla, Red Hat, Heroku, and Eventbrite.`,
            "media": "/courses/cover/glases.jpeg",
            "author": 3,
            "slug": "course-slug",
            "objectifs": "hello world, objectifs",
            "is_video": false
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "title": "course title la thermodynamique",
            "description": ` Django REST framework is a powerful and flexible toolkit for building Web APIs.

Some reasons you might want to use REST framework:

The Web browsable API is a huge usability win for your developers.
Authentication policies including packages for OAuth1a and OAuth2.

Customizable all the way down - just use regular function-based views if you don't need the more powerful features.

            "slug": "course-slug2",
            "objectifs": "hello world, objectifs",
            "is_video": false
        }
    ]
}

const fetchCourse = async (slug) =>{
    const data ={
    "id": 1,

Some reasons you might want to use REST framework:

The Web browsable API is a huge usability win for your developers.
Authentication policies including packages for OAuth1a and OAuth2.
Serialization that supports both ORM and non-ORM data sources.
Customizable all the way down - just use regular function-based views if you don't need the more powerful features.
Extensive documentation, and great community support.
Used and trusted by internationally recognised companies including Mozilla, Red Hat, Heroku, and Eventbrite.`,
    "media": "http://localhost:8000/courses/cover/glases.jpeg",
    "author": 3,
    "slug": "course-slug",
    "objectifs": "hello world, objectifs",
    "is_video": false
  }

	return data
}

const fetchChaptersForCourse = async (slug) =>{

	return  [

Used and trusted by internationally recognised companies including Mozilla, Red Hat, Heroku, and Eventbrite.`,
        "course": 2,

]
}

        "course": 2,

    }


    ,

    {

        "introduction": ` Django REST framework is a powerful and flexible toolkit for building Web APIs.

Some reasons you might want to use REST framework:

The Web browsable API is a huge usability win for your developers.
Authentication policies including packages for OAuth1a and OAuth2.

Some reasons you might want to use REST framework:

The Web browsable API is a huge usability win for your developers.
Authentication policies including packages for OAuth1a and OAuth2.

Customizable all the way down - just use regular function-based views if you don't need the more powerful features.
Extensive documentation, and great community support.
Used and trusted by internationally recognised companies including Mozilla, Red Hat, Heroku, and Eventbrite.`,
        "course": 3,
        "media": 'http://picsum.photos/300'
    }
      
     ]

	return data[parseInt(id)]
}

export {
	fetchCourses,
	fetchCourse,

}
